title: MF Transactions Process - Lumpsum

steps.task: Ensure the client’s KYC is valid and updated.
Select a mutual fund scheme based on client goals & risk profile.
Make sure bank is registered at transaction platform for Purchase.
Initiate the transaction via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE NMF II / BSE Star MF
Lumpsum: Process via OTM, UPI, Net Banking, RTGS, NEFT
Validate your Transaction via 2 factor Authentication Email & SMS
Confirm -  If the transaction is processed in T+2 days.
Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client.
Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting.

content:
1. Ensure the client’s KYC is valid and updated. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
2. Select a mutual fund scheme based on client goals & risk profile. (Role: Sunil Chachlani) [Tools: ]
3. Make sure bank is registered at transaction platform for Purchase. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
4. Initiate the transaction via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE NMF II / BSE Star MF (Role: Back office team) [Tools: CAMS / Kary 
MFU/BSE/NSE]
5. Lumpsum: Process via OTM, UPI, Net Banking, RTGS, NEFT (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: ]
6. Validate your Transaction via 2 factor Authentication Email & SMS (Role: RM/ Ops) [Tools: NSE, BSE, MFU/ ND]
7. Confirm -  If the transaction is processed in T+2 days. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
8. Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: Email / WhatsApp.]
9. Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]

title: MF Transactions Process - SIP

steps.task: Ensure the client’s KYC is valid and updated.
Select a mutual fund scheme based on client goals & risk profile.
Create an e-NACH Mandate via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE NMF II / BSE Star MF
Initiate the Transaction Request.
Make sure bank is registered at transaction platform for SIP.
SIP: Process via an e-NACH Mandate or UPI mandate (KYC is Validated)
Existing folio: If folio exists, register new SIP using e-NACH without opening a new folio.
Confirm -  If the transaction is processed in T+2 days.
Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client.
Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting.

content:
1. Ensure the client’s KYC is valid and updated. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
2. Select a mutual fund scheme based on client goals & risk profile. (Role: Sunil Chachlani) [Tools: ]
3. Create an e-NACH Mandate via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE NMF II / BSE Star MF (Role: Back office team) [Tools: CAMS / Kary 
MFU/BSE/NSE]
4. Initiate the Transaction Request. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
5. Make sure bank is registered at transaction platform for SIP. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
6. SIP: Process via an e-NACH Mandate or UPI mandate (KYC is Validated) (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
7. Existing folio: If folio exists, register new SIP using e-NACH without opening a new folio. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
8. Confirm -  If the transaction is processed in T+2 days. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
9. Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
10. Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]

title: MF Transactions Process - Redemption

steps.task: Get confirmation from the client for redemption amount and folio details.
Check the registered bank is active or not.
Choose wether you want withdraw ALL units/ No. of units / Specific Amount.
Verify the exit load applicability and assess capital gain tax implications before proceeding.
Confirm the Bank Account Details with the Client before executing.
Place the request via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE/BSE platform.
Track redemption status and ensure fund house processes it as per schedule.
Ensure payout is credited to the registered bank account within T+2 days (equity) or T+1 day (liquid funds), T+5 (International)
Confirm & Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client.
Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting.

content:
1. Get confirmation from the client for redemption amount and folio details. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: ]
2. Check the registered bank is active or not. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
3. Choose wether you want withdraw ALL units/ No. of units / Specific Amount. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: ]
4. Verify the exit load applicability and assess capital gain tax implications before proceeding. (Role: Sunil Chachlani) [Tools: ]
5. Confirm the Bank Account Details with the Client before executing. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
6. Place the request via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE/BSE platform. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: CAMS / Kary 
MFU/BSE/NSE]
7. Track redemption status and ensure fund house processes it as per schedule. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
8. Ensure payout is credited to the registered bank account within T+2 days (equity) or T+1 day (liquid funds), T+5 (International) (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
9. Confirm & Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
10. Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]

title: MF Transactions Process - SWP

steps.task: Get confirmation from the client for monthly redemption amount and folio details.
Place the request via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE/BSE platform.
Confirm Bank account before starting SWP
Track redemption status and ensure fund house processes it as per schedule.
Confirm & Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client.
Review SWP units pending when nearing completion

content:
1. Get confirmation from the client for monthly redemption amount and folio details. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
2. Place the request via RTA (CAMS/KFintech), MFU, or NSE/BSE platform. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: CAMS / Kary 
MFU/BSE/NSE]
3. Confirm Bank account before starting SWP (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
4. Track redemption status and ensure fund house processes it as per schedule. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
5. Confirm & Communicate - Provide the transaction confirmation receipt to the client. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
6. Review SWP units pending when nearing completion (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]

title: MF Transaction Process - Switch

steps.task: Collect confirmation from the client for the switch transaction.
Choose wether you want to transfer Full Portfolio / Specific Amount.
Execute switch requests through MFU/NSE/BSE or AMC portal.
Once switch is processed, ensure the amount is allocated to the target scheme with updated folio/unit details.
Send a transaction summary to the client including date, amount, and new fund units allocated.
Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting.

content:
1. Collect confirmation from the client for the switch transaction. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
2. Choose wether you want to transfer Full Portfolio / Specific Amount. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: ]
3. Execute switch requests through MFU/NSE/BSE or AMC portal. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: CAMS / Kary 
MFU/BSE/NSE]
4. Once switch is processed, ensure the amount is allocated to the target scheme with updated folio/unit details. (Role: Kiran Chachlani) [Tools: ]
5. Send a transaction summary to the client including date, amount, and new fund units allocated. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
6. Update internal records - Log the transaction in your database / software for future review and reporting. (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]

title: Change of Bank Details – Update bank account linked to MF investments.

steps.task: Collect cancelled cheque (with pre-printed name) and latest 3-month bank statement or passbook copy.
Fill the bank change request form from CAMS/KFintech.
Check the details with the client and get their signature / or validate via online OTP.
Submit the form online via Portal or Offline at your nearest RTA Branch.
Obtain and retain the acknowledgment receipt.
Track the Status and Update the Client once done.
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

content:
1. Collect cancelled cheque (with pre-printed name) and latest 3-month bank statement or passbook copy. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
2. Fill the bank change request form from CAMS/KFintech. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
3. Check the details with the client and get their signature / or validate via online OTP. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
4. Submit the form online via Portal or Offline at your nearest RTA Branch. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
5. Obtain and retain the acknowledgment receipt. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
6. Track the Status and Update the Client once done. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
7. Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

title: Change of Address, FATCA or Tax Status.

steps.task: Any update in address, FATCA, or tax status must be routed through the KYC modification process.
Collect required documents based on the type of change.
Fill the latest KYC Modification Form online via CAMS/Karvy Portal.
Submit the Form along with the Documents.
Check status on the respective KRA portal, once approved, changes will auto-reflect across all mutual fund folios.
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

content:
1. Any update in address, FATCA, or tax status must be routed through the KYC modification process. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
2. Collect required documents based on the type of change. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

4. Submit the Form along with the Documents. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
5. Check status on the respective KRA portal, once approved, changes will auto-reflect across all mutual fund folios. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
6. Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

Attach an PAN Card Copy & validate through OTP.
Confirm contact update via email/SMS received.
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

title: Change of Name / PAN Aadhar Upate

steps.task: Request Change of Name letter signed by the Client.
For correction of name, for individual investors, Affidavit from the Client on stamp paper of value Rs.100/-
Attach self-attested New PAN Copy & KYC / FATCA & CRS with new Name
In case of Marriage - Attach Self-Attested Marriage Certificate Photocopy - Notarized
Sumit the request to AMCs / KRAs.
Check status on the respective KRA/AMCs portal, once approved, changes will auto-reflect across all mutual fund folios.
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

content:
1. Request Change of Name letter signed by the Client. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
2. For correction of name, for individual investors, Affidavit from the Client on stamp paper of value Rs.100/- (Role: ) [Tools: ]
3. Attach self-attested New PAN Copy & KYC / FATCA & CRS with new Name (Role: ) [Tools: ]
4. In case of Marriage - Attach Self-Attested Marriage Certificate Photocopy - Notarized (Role: ) [Tools: ]
5. Sumit the request to AMCs / KRAs. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

7. Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

title: Change / Updation / Addition of Nominee

steps.task: Check Existing Nomination Status - Download the client’s CAS via MF Central, Review each folio to identify where nomination is missing or outdated.

Choose Nomination Mode:
Online (Recommended): Use MF Central, CAMS/KFintech portal, or AMC portal for e-nomination.
Offline: Use the standard Nomination Form (Might differ for each AMCs)
Collect Required Details & Documents (Self Attested PAN & Id Proof)
Submit Nomination Request: Online (via Aadhar e signr) Offline (Submit to AMCs / RTAs)
Acknowledgment is received via SMS/email post acceptance.
Nominee details get auto-updated across folios (if PAN-linked).
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

content:
1. Check Existing Nomination Status - Download the client’s CAS via MF Central, Review each folio to identify where nomination is missing or outdated. (Role: ) [Tools: MF Central / RTAs]
2. Choose Nomination Mode:
Online (Recommended): Use MF Central, CAMS/KFintech portal, or AMC portal for e-nomination.
Offline: Use the standard Nomination Form (Might differ for each AMCs) (Role: ) [Tools: ]
3. Collect Required Details & Documents (Self Attested PAN & Id Proof) (Role: ) [Tools: ]
4. Submit Nomination Request: Online (via Aadhar e signr) Offline (Submit to AMCs / RTAs) (Role: ) [Tools: ]
5. Acknowledgment is received via SMS/email post acceptance. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
6. Nominee details get auto-updated across folios (if PAN-linked). (Role: ) [Tools: ]
7. Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

title: Minor to Major

steps.task: Fill the MAM AMFI Designated Request Form.
Attach New and Old Bank Cancelled cheque with applicant’s name pre-printed.
Attach a PAN CARD & KYC Acknowledgment OR form of applicant.
Submit offline via AMC or RTA branch near you.
Check status with the respective RTA/AMCs.
Update internal records - Log the request in your database / software as completed.

title: Transmission after Death of Unit Holder

steps.task: Fetch & Fill out the T3 Form from AMFI's Website. (Check Annexure B for Documents required for each case)
Attach the Death Certificate of deceased Unit Holder.
Attach KYC of the Claimant/Guardian.
Attach Cancelled cheque leaf with name and bank account number pre-printed (OR) Copy of bank statement attested by a Notary Public or a Gazetted Officer or Bank Manager.
Additional proof of the deceased proof attested by the claimant: Redacted Aadhaar / PAN etc
Copy of PAN Card of the Nominee(s)/Guardian (in case the Nominee is a minor)
Nomination/opt Out Form by the claimant.
Check for PAN Aadhaar linkage status of the Nominee

Signature Attestation Requirement:
For transmission value up to ₹5 lakhs, claimant/guardian’s signature must be attested by a Bank Manager (Annexure I-A).
For value above ₹5 lakhs (PAN level), attestation must be done by a Notary Public or Judicial Magistrate First Class (T3 Form).
Coyright Network FP | Only QPFP® Certificants & NFP ProMember® are licensed to use this Resource / ProTool.

content:
1. Fetch & Fill out the T3 Form from AMFI's Website. (Check Annexure B for Documents required for each case) (Role: ) [Tools: Click here]

3. Attach KYC of the Claimant/Guardian. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
4. Attach Cancelled cheque leaf with name and bank account number pre-printed (OR) Copy of bank statement attested by a Notary Public or a Gazetted Officer or Bank Manager. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

7. Nomination/opt Out Form by the claimant. (Role: ) [Tools: ]
8. Check for PAN Aadhaar linkage status of the Nominee (Role: ) [Tools: ]
9. Signature Attestation Requirement:
For transmission value up to ₹5 lakhs, claimant/guardian’s signature must be attested by a Bank Manager (Annexure I-A).
For value above ₹5 lakhs (PAN level), attestation must be done by a Notary Public or Judicial Magistrate First Class (T3 Form). (Role: ) [Tools: ]
10. Coyright Network FP | Only QPFP® Certificants & NFP ProMember® are licensed to use this Resource / ProTool. (Role: ) [Tools: ]

title: Zero Folio Creation

steps.task: Fill the application form and attach supporting documents (KYC, PAN, proof of address, etc.)
Send scanned copy of filled form + documents to ifsc.investor@dspim.com
steps.template: Keep the copies in Client Folder

steps.task: Track CAMS for application review (TAT 2-3 days)
Courier physical copy of duly filled application + docs after folio creation
steps.template: Address: DSP Fund Managers IFSC Pvt. Ltd., 508–509, 5th Floor, Pragya 2, GIFT SEZ, Gift City, Gandhinagar, Gujarat–382050

content:
1. Fill the application form and attach supporting documents (KYC, PAN, proof of address, etc.) (Role: Back office team) [Tools: -]
2. Send scanned copy of filled form + documents to ifsc.investor@dspim.com (Role: Back office team) [Tools: Mail]
3. Track CAMS for application review (TAT 2-3 days) (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
4. Courier physical copy of duly filled application + docs after folio creation (Role: Back office team) [Tools: Courier service]

title: Transfer of funds/Remittance (For Client)

steps.task: Verify mode of transfer: Digital (Bank app) / Physical branch with Client
For Digital: Use bank’s outward USD remittance feature
steps.template: Share Bank Account details mentioned on Pg 2 of Application Form

steps.task: For Branch: Select authorized dealer bank and remit funds
Email proof of remittance to ifsc.investor@dspim.com

content:
1. Verify mode of transfer: Digital (Bank app) / Physical branch with Client (Role: Back office team) [Tools: WhatsApp]
2. For Digital: Use bank’s outward USD remittance feature (Role: Client) [Tools: ]
3. For Branch: Select authorized dealer bank and remit funds (Role: Client) [Tools: RBI authorized dealer list]
4. Email proof of remittance to ifsc.investor@dspim.com (Role: Back office team) [Tools: Email]

title: CKYC/KIN Requirement

steps.task: Check KYC for KIN
If KIN exists, proceed with zero folio creation
If KIN not available, submit CKYC form with docs

content:
1. Check KYC for KIN (Role: Back office team) [Tools: CKYC website]
2. If KIN exists, proceed with zero folio creation (Role: Back office team) [Tools: ]
3. If KIN not available, submit CKYC form with docs (Role: Back office team) [Tools: CKYC form]

title: How to change bank details in CAN
sourceFile: How to change bank details in CAN.docx

steps.task:
For Change/Addition/Deletion Bank details in CAN 

Go to Multiple NCT-Mandate-Fillable form (Path: C:\LMW Backoffice\OneDrive - Let Money Work\LMW Back Office\My Documents\mutual fund\All Application Forms\Download\MFU)



Fill up the form as per requires of changes



Information Required:

New Bank Account Number

New Bank Account Type

New Bank IFSC

New Bank MICR



Self-Attested Cheque copy of the new bank is required.  If we have customer’s signature, then manage it through Edit option PDF



Take color printout of form & cheque if we don’t have copy of cancelled cheque.



Submit in CAMS office.



How to Check status in MFU

Go to Tracker

Go to CAN Tracker

Search via date or CAN number and check registration status.

content:
For Change/Addition/Deletion Bank details in CAN 

Go to Multiple NCT-Mandate-Fillable form (Path: C:\LMW Backoffice\OneDrive - Let Money Work\LMW Back Office\My Documents\mutual fund\All Application Forms\Download\MFU)



Fill up the form as per requires of changes



Information Required:

New Bank Account Number

New Bank Account Type

New Bank IFSC

New Bank MICR



Self-Attested Cheque copy of the new bank is required.  If we have customer’s signature, then manage it through Edit option PDF



Take color printout of form & cheque if we don’t have copy of cancelled cheque.



Submit in CAMS office.



How to Check status in MFU

Go to Tracker

Go to CAN Tracker

Search via date or CAN number and check registration status.

title: How to process SIP order with FOT
sourceFile: How to process SIP order with FOT.docx

steps.task:
How to place SIP order with FOT



Login MFU

Go to CAN tracker

Search CAN as per name & browse

As the line of customer name in that Options select last one option (TransactEezz) SIP option and continue.



In transaction details

Select AMC name

Folio Number (select existing or new folio as require)

Enter the scheme name

Frequency – Monthly

Instalment Day/Date – Select the date (which is deduction dates)

Select Start month & year & End date is one month before end date of mandate

Enter amount



If SIP is started with FOT-First order today, then use 

In Payment details, Tick on Current dated payment,

Select payment type (Mode of payment)

Select Source of Account No is Bank Account & Press TAB

Then automatic reflected amount to transfer

Enter Remark & Submit order.

content:
How to place SIP order with FOT



Login MFU

Go to CAN tracker

Search CAN as per name & browse

As the line of customer name in that Options select last one option (TransactEezz) SIP option and continue.



In transaction details

Select AMC name

Folio Number (select existing or new folio as require)

Enter the scheme name

Frequency – Monthly

Instalment Day/Date – Select the date (which is deduction dates)

Select Start month & year & End date is one month before end date of mandate

Enter amount



If SIP is started with FOT-First order today, then use 

In Payment details, Tick on Current dated payment,

Select payment type (Mode of payment)

Select Source of Account No is Bank Account & Press TAB

Then automatic reflected amount to transfer

Enter Remark & Submit order.
